channel.title: I wish
channel.description:
Well i was looking at the forums stats and noticed that this one post had the most comments i went and read it and saw it was about some wish game. In this game you make a wish then someone else makes your Wish come true but with a bad consequence. Im not sure if the game was banned, if it was sorry for posting this, here i go.
[b]I wish that no one in africa would ever starve[/b]

item.description:

Yeah, the other one was locked for a reason.

Read full topic

item.title: I wish
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:13, topic:238969”]Wish granted, but Linux becomes proprietary.

I wish somebody remembered the fact that forum games were not allowed, and that there already was a thread exactly like this one (but much longer) that got locked.[/quote]Wish granted, but some idiot makes another one months later.

Read full topic

item.title: I wish

[quote=“lesterknome, post:11, topic:238969”]i wish i had a lama name alfred and i could poke him where it hurts >=) (In the lower intestent)[/quote]Wish granted, but he eats you.

item.title: I wish
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:

Cain_:

i wish that everyone stopped trying to help third world countries and just let them die.

There is no helping them…they want to kill their own people, everyone talking about this right now, go watch blood diamond, again.
